name: Phantom Shot
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

Play Windows build to play without audio static.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Right Click - Leave/re-enter body
  • Left Click and Hold - Draw bow
  • Release Left Click - Shoot arrow in direction of cursor
  • Spacebar - Dash

Tips:

  • You cannot use your bow in your physical body
  • Altars must be activated by walking over with physical body
  • Killing spirits only counts toward progress when an altar is activated
  • After destroying an altar, walk over to another altar with your physical body to activate it
  • Destroy all 5 altars to win

A game where you can leave your physical body as a spirit and kill evil ghosts by shooting them with your spiritual bow and arrow. Made in Godot.

Youtube devlog for how I made this game coming out this Monday (02/28). Stay tuned here! SquidGodDev Youtube Channel
